title: DVDFab.Platinum.v3.2.0.0.Cracked-F4CG
description:
Here is the latest version of DVDFab, straight out the oven. F4CG have done a good job cracking this one quickly, but it would have been nice to see a keygen for it. Ah well.

DVDFab Platinum is all-in-one DVD copying/converting/burning software. In just one or two steps, you can copy any DVD to DVDR/PSP/iPod/etc. DVDFab Platinum 3 is brand new, is completely rewritten, is based on more than 6 years of DVD copysoftware development.

Program Features:

    * 6 DVD to DVD copy modes available: Full Disc, Main Movie, Split, Customize, Clone and Merge.
    * Very fast copying speed, normally it?s about 10 - 20 minutes.
    * 6 DVD to Mobile copy modes available: Generic, iPod, PSP, Cell Phone, PVP and PDA. More devices support can be added manually.
    * Remove all DVD copy protections, like CSS, CPPM, RC, RCE, APS, UOPs, ARccOS, RipGuard, FluxDVD, CORE X2, etc.
    * Constantly updated to support latest DVD copy protections.

System Requirements:

    * Windows Vista/XP/2000/98/ME
    * Pentium II 500 MHz
    * 256 MB of RAM
    * 10 GB of Free Hard Disk Space
    * A DVD-R(W) or DVD+R(W) Drive
